Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents the single Worker object which contains the main info and methods.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • initPosition

      public void initPosition​(Position position)
      Set the initial Position of the Worker.
      Parameters:
      position - Position of the Worker.

    • move

      public void move​(Position position)
      Move the Worker to the given position.
      Parameters:
      position - a valid position to move

    • getPossibleBuilds

      public java.util.List<Position> getPossibleBuilds​(Position checkPos, boolean ignoreCurrentPosition)
      Returns the adjacent positions where this worker can normally build. Non-free spaces will be ignored Space.isFree(). Set the boolean parameter to true to ignore the current worker position in the list of the possible builds. This is needed to calculate the list of possible builds before the actual move is done.
      Parameters:
      checkPos - the starting position to check
      ignoreCurrentPosition - set to true to ignore the current position of the worker, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      a list of positions where this worker can build.

    • getPossibleBuilds

      public java.util.List<Position> getPossibleBuilds()
      Returns the adjacent positions where this worker can normally build. Non-free spaces will be ignored Space.isFree().
      Returns:
      a list of positions where this worker can build.

    • getPossibleMoves

      public java.util.List<Position> getPossibleMoves()
      Returns a List of adjacent and "level compatible" positions to the worker's position. Locked movements are also filtered.
      Returns:
      a List of adjacent and "level compatible" positions to the worker's position.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Returns the level of the worker in his current position.
      Returns:
      the level of the worker in his current position.

    • hasMovedUp

      public boolean hasMovedUp()
      Returns true if the worker has moved up by one level, false otherwise. This methods compares the last saved position of the worker with the argument one.
      Returns:
      true if the worker has moved up by one level, false otherwise.

    • hasMovedDown

      public boolean hasMovedDown()
      Returns true if the worker has moved down by one or more levels, false otherwise. This methods compares the last saved position of the worker with the argument one.
      Returns:
      true if the worker has moved down by one or more levels, false otherwise.

    • hasMovedFlat

      public boolean hasMovedFlat()
      Returns true if the worker has moved flat, false otherwise. A move is considered to be "flat" if the level has not changed. This methods compares the last saved position of the worker with the argument one.
      Returns:
      true if the worker has moved flat, false otherwise.

    • updateBuildHistory

      public void updateBuildHistory​(Position position)
      Updates the worker build history. Call this method only to update the worker history. The block must be built with board methods.
      Parameters:
      position - worker's build position in the previous turn

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Return the Position of the Worker.
      Returns:
      Position of the Worker.

    • getHistory

      public History getHistory()
      Returns a copy of History of this worker.
      Returns:
      a copy of History of this worker.

    • checkLockedMovement

      public boolean checkLockedMovement​(MoveType moveType)
      Checks if this worker has the argument moveType locked. This worker cannot perform a move in the direction of the argument moveType. Returns true if the MoveType argument is locked, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      moveType - the MoveType to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the MoveType argument is locked, false otherwise.

    • filterLockedMovementPositions

      public java.util.List<Position> filterLockedMovementPositions​(java.util.List<Position> positions)
      Filters a list of positions argument by removing all the positions in conflict with the current locked movements applied to the worker.
      Parameters:
      positions - a list of positions to be filtered.
      Returns:
      a list of filtered positions.

    • addLockedMovement

      public void addLockedMovement​(MoveType moveType)
      Adds a locked movement to the worker. The worker will no more be able to move in that way.
      Parameters:
      moveType - the movement type to be locked.

    • removeLockedMovement

      public void removeLockedMovement​(MoveType moveType)
      Removes a locked movement applied to the worker. The worker will be able again to move in that way.
      Parameters:
      moveType - the movement type to be unlocked.

    • removeAllLockedMovements

      public void removeAllLockedMovements()
      Removes all locked movements applied to the worker. The worker will be able again to move in every way normally possible.

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      Return the Color of the Worker.
      Returns:
      Color of the Worker.

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(Color color)
      Set the Color of the Worker.
      Parameters:
      color - Color of the Worker.
